body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joshua Hayes and the customer's name is Marilyn Wright.  The conversation is about Dogs Playing Poker (a Art Gallery ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling GoodTech Support. My name is Alex. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble with my account login.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To assist you further, may I have your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also provide me with the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. I have everything I need to look into this. I appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No problem, thanks for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Sarah. Have a great day!
